sources.title: Customer Churn Analysis in the Wireless Industry: A Data Mining Approach
key_findings: Churn rate in the digital industry is significantly influenced by customer satisfaction and service quality
Effective churn management can increase profitability by 5% to 95%
sources.usage_note: This study provides insights into factors influencing churn and strategies to manage it, which can be applied to the digital home industry

sources.title: Churn Management in the Telecom Industry of Pakistan: Determinants of Customer Churn in the Cellular Sector of Pakistan
key_findings: Price sensitivity, service quality, and customer satisfaction are the main determinants of customer churn
Churn can be reduced by improving service quality and customer satisfaction
sources.usage_note: This report provides insights into the determinants of churn, which can be used to develop strategies to reduce churn in the digital home industry

assumptions: The findings from the telecom industry can be applied to the digital home industry
